00029 #ifndef _GMDP_H_
00030 #define _GMDP_H_
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 
00034 //tolua_begin
00035 class gmdpsrc: public in1out {
00036   typedef       in1out  baseclass;
00037   
00038 public:
00039   gmdpsrc(void);
00040   ~gmdpsrc(void);
00041   void early(event *);
00042   int act(void);
00043   void setTable(void *tab, int i){tables[i] = (tim_typ*)tab;}
00044   void *getTable(int i){return tables[i];}
00045   void setDelta(int delta, int i){this->delta[i] = delta;}
00046   int getDelta(int i){return this->delta[i];}
00047   void setTrans(double trans, int i){this->trans[i] = trans;}
00048   double getTrans(double trans, int i){return this->trans[i];}
00049   void allocTables(int n_stat);
00050   int n_stat;   // # of states 
00051   //tolua_end
00052   int *delta;   // cell distances: in case of 0 bit rate is zero,
00053                 // ex then gives the phase duration 
00054   tim_typ **tables; // transformation tables for sojourn time distributions
00055   
00056   int state;    // current state 
00057   int cell_cnt; // # of cells yet to be sent in the current state 
00058   int **trafo;  // transition probabilities between states, already stored
00059                 // as PDFs 
00060   double *trans;
00061 
00062 };//tolua_export
00063 
00064 #endif  // _GMDP_H_
